attributes.action: Make ePetitions be clear statements of action or No change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All UK governments to date have been unaccountable to its citizens except in the 4 year election cycle.   

Responses to ePetitions tend to be responses that actually mean little and promise nothing.  They are a statement of the current situation rather than a promise or action plan of what will be done.

Response to ePetition should state.   No, we will not change ..., or Yes, we will be amending the xyz Bill to rectify this situation.


Just for once, or even forever in the future, a straight Yes/No answer would be infinitely preferable.
Please can we have this implemented (Yes/No)?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
